articles.description: DeMarcus Cousins called out James Harden for the disrespect all season long. He said the Beard hadn't given his new teammates any chance of gelling. Following their second blowout loss to the Lakers last night, Harden publicly demanded a trade. He said he did…
articles.content:

articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: Modric challenges Odegaard to earn Real Madrid place and says Hazard will prove his worth - Goal.com
articles.description: Dayot Upamecano would be “a great signing for Liverpool” admits John Barnes, but the Reds legend is not convinced that the RB Leipzig defender could be acquired in January or that rival interest can be fended off.

articles.title: Tash Farrant to tour New Zealand, Anya Shrubsole out injured - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: England name 16-strong squad as fixtures unveiled for ODI, T20I series in February-March
articles.content:
